HOT COCOA TAPPER

Retro Arcade Game

Press SPACE to Start

↑↓ or W/S to Move

HOW TO PLAY

  • • Hold SPACE to fill
  • • Release to serve
  • • 70%+ fill = bonus
  • • 60s per level

MECHANICS

  • • Beat impatience!
  • • 70% = good score
  • • Miss = -points
  • • Reach goal advance

DIFFICULTY

  • • Level = faster pace
  • • Impatience increases
  • • Higher score needs
  • • More points earned
